name: Chicken Devan
recipeIngredient: 2 Pkg. Broccoli cuts (i like to used chopped)
3 Whole Chicken breasts (cooked, boned and cut in pieces)
2 Cans condensed cream of chicken soup (i use Campbells healthy choice)

recipeInstructions.text: Place broccoli in 9x13 pan season with salt and pepper. Place chicken on top, make a sauce of soup, mayo, lemon juice and curry. Pour over above, sprinkle with cheese.
